entry.title: Courts Come to Order With Judges, Litigants ---But No Lawyers
entry.content: More people are forgoing lawyers in state civil courts. Some can’t afford one, have had bad experiences with them or prefer to rely on advice and tools posted online.

entry.title: Israel Declares War on Hamas After Surprise Assault From Gaza
entry.content: Hamas fired thousands of rockets as far north as Tel Aviv and sent fighters into southern cities near the border.

entry.title: Ukraine's Liberated Areas Struggle as Land Mines, Worker Shortages Hamper Recovery
entry.content: Economic woes in Ukraine’s east threaten lasting damage for the country.
